channel.title: PlutoPower Future Bass Project I Guess
channel.description: https://app.auxy.co/projects/2I6migDw8GfVvL1SB2hWLQ== So I tried to make future Bass, because it sounds cool, but I don’t really know how, so I made something and I don’t know how good it is. Could someone experienced in this genre please help?

item.title: PlutoPower Future Bass Project I Guess

item.source: PlutoPower Future Bass Project I Guess

item.title: PlutoPower Future Bass Project I Guess
item.dc:creator: Matik
item.description:
I’m not the most experienced in the genre, but the majority of stuff I’ve been working on consists of future bass. First off, I have to say that this is pretty good for an attempt, and like @6Strings said, you should try and spice it up a little with the chord progressions. You should use less instruments are used at the start, and as it builds up, gradually add in those instruments to make the power of the wub sound better, preferably after the drop.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/9eLlMpO-jr9akZlju9KfQw==
I made this just as an experiment, using your chord progressions and one that I made myself, just to give you some automation ideas in the future. (hah cheeky pun)

Read full topic
